item.title: Cant add this
item.dc:creator: @saw4 saw4
item.description:
@saw4 wrote:

[quote=“purestmage74, post:4, topic:416372”]Yeah you don’t declare the systemmillis deal in with the first diceid ==.

Would go like this:

/* Save character quest tab */ case 113244: //<--- Your DiceId == if(System.currentTimeMillis() - c.lastEmote >= 15000) { //Whatever it is your doing the code goes in here } else { c.sendMessage("<shad=255>You can only roll every 15 seconds.</col>"); } c.lastEmote = System.currentTimeMillis(); break;

That’s ripped off quest tab saving so you can remove the “roll every 15 seconds” text if you want, hope it helps.[/quote]

Umm how does this help me??? and if u know how can u tv me really quick???

Read full topic

item.title: Cant add this
item.dc:creator: @purestmage74 purestmage74
item.description:
@purestmage74 wrote:

Yeah you don’t declare the systemmillis deal in with the first diceid ==.

Would go like this:

/* Save character quest tab */ case 113244: //<--- Your DiceId == if(System.currentTimeMillis() - c.lastEmote >= 15000) { //Whatever it is your doing the code goes in here } else { c.sendMessage("<shad=255>You can only roll every 15 seconds.</col>"); } c.lastEmote = System.currentTimeMillis(); break;

That’s ripped off quest tab saving so you can remove the “roll every 15 seconds” text if you want, hope it helps.

Read full topic
